A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you have seen the other SW films first. This one adds to the action\, drama\, suspense. It is a welcomed member to the SW saga to me\, which started in a galaxy far\,far\, away\, way before I was born. I liked the juxtaposition of characters and the fresh characters that didnt seem to be the usual. By that I mean\, they were easy to see as ordinary folks caught up in this big mess\, that being the empire and rebel conflict. With that said\, I felt like I was joining in on the battle\, or at least feeling I was there first hand to witness the historic events unfold.
